New Records: Luis Gil lowered his ERA to 3.24
Key Match Events: Luis Gil had a no-hitter through 3.1 innings
Austin Wells was picked off first base for the final out
Luis Gil struck out seven and walked two on just 89 pitches
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees needed a good outing by their starter after the series loss to the Rangers
Post-Match Reflections: Luis Gil's performance was a huge help for the Yankees
The bullpen was just as dominant as Gil with Jake Cousins, Tommy Kahnle and Luke Weaver each pitching a scoreless inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Rizzo received a warm welcome from the crowd of his former team in his first at-bat in the second inning
The game was a 3-0 win for the Yankees
The Yanks and Cubs continue their weekend series on Saturday with another matinee game
Others: Jake Weaver recorded his first save of the season
Clay Holmes lost his closer role earlier in the week following his 11th blown save
